text: The men's 100 metres event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 16 and 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Darrel Brown ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Marc Burns ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Willie Hordge ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July Wind: -0.6m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
